ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
 Packages.java.lang,
 Packages.javax.crypto,
 Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
 Packages.java.io,
 Packages.java.util,
 Packages.java.util.zip,
);

with(javaImport){
 function decrypt(str){
 	
 	var h=result.substring(16);
 	var u=result.substring(0,16);
 	var k = 'Shuew237HSFH242s';
 	var m=java.aesBase64DecodeToByteArray(h,k ,"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", u);
 var arr1 = new Array(m.length+1);
 arr1.push(m);
 arr1[m.length]=0;
 var inflaterInputStream = new InflaterInputStream(new ByteArrayInputStream(m));
 var byteArrayOutputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream(512);
 while (true) {
 var read = inflaterInputStream.read();
 if (read != -1) {
 byteArrayOutputStream.write(read);
 } else {
 	byteArrayOutputStream.close();
 return byteArrayOutputStream.toString();
 }
 }
 }
}
decrypt(result)
</js>$.data

ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>
let bid=java.get('bid')let body=java.get('referer');
let serialnum=java.put('pages',java.getString('serialnum'));
let time=java.timeFormatUTC(new Date(),'yyyyMMddHHmmss',8);
let url='https://bookshelf.html5.qq.com/kdread/api/book/list-chapter?t='+time+'&resourceid='+bid+'&start=1&count=100&serialnum='+serialnum+'&sort=asc'url+','+body;
</js>

ruleSearch.author: $.author
ruleSearch.bookUrl:
<js>
let bid=java.put('bid',java.getString('docId').split('_')[1]);
let time=java.timeFormatUTC(new Date(),'yyyyMMddHHmmss',8);
let url='https://bookshelf.html5.qq.com/kdread/api/novel/adbooks/bookinfo?bookid='+bid+'&t='+time;
let referer='https://bookshelf.html5.qq.com/kdread/adread/catalog?resourceid='+bid+'&sort=desc&traceid=0024001';
let body=java.put('referer',JSON.stringify({"headers":{"Referer":referer}}))url+','+body;
</js>
ruleSearch.name: $.title

ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>
let time=java.timeFormatUTC(new Date(),'yyyyMMddHHmmss',8);
let bid=java.get('bid')let pages=java.get("pages");
let resId=java.getString("resourceid");
let serialid=java.getString("serialid");
let adsParam=encodeURIComponent({"iChapterNum":1,"iCurChapter":1,"bPay":false,"iFirstCategory":1,"iSecondCategory":14,"pages":pages,"bChaseUpdate":0});
let body=JSON.stringify({"headers":{"Referer":'https://bookshelf.html5.qq.com/kdread/adread/chapter?resourceid='+resId+'&serialid='+serialid+'&shelftype=&from=catalog&traceid=0024001'}});
let url='https://bookshelf.html5.qq.com/kdread/api/wenxue/buy/ad-chapter/v3?t='+time+'&resourceid='+resId+'&serialid='+serialid+'&apn=1&readnum=1&forceShowVideo=1&adsParam='+adsParam+'&version=202008101749&duration=2&qaid=&abtid=100000_100000_100000_102726_2409968_101751&adr=1&adb=1&taid=&oaid=&macAddress=&androidID=&srcCh='url+','+body;
</js>
ruleToc.nextTocUrl:

list.push(baseUrl.replace(/start=\d+/, 'start=' + i));

list;
</js>

ruleSearch.bookUrl:
<js>
var bid=parseInt(java.getString('$.bookId'));
if(!bid>0){
bid=parseInt(java.getString('$.id'));
}
java.put("bid",bid);
var subpath=parseInt((1999+bid)/2000);
var url="http://statics.rungean.com/static/book/zip/"+subpath+"/"+bid+".zip";
result=url;</js>

ruleSearch.author: $.author@put:{author:$.author}
ruleSearch.bookUrl:
<js>
var bid=parseInt(java.getString('$.bookId'));
if(!bid>0){
bid=parseInt(java.getString('$.id'));
}
java.put("bid",bid);
var subpath=parseInt((1999+bid)/2000);
var url="http://statics.rungean.com/static/book/zip/"+subpath+"/"+bid+".zip";
result=url;</js>
ruleSearch.name: $.name@put:{name:$.name}

ruleBookInfo.author: class.book_info.0@tag.a.0@text
ruleBookInfo.kind:
<js>result=String(result).replace(/<h2>.*<\/h2>/,String(result).match(/continue/)?'<h2>连载中<\/h2>':'<h2>已完结<\/h2>').replace(/<\/a><a[^>]*>/g," / ")</js>
class.book_info.0@tag.h2.0@text&&
class.book_info.0@tag.div.2@text##类型：
ruleBookInfo.name: class.book_info.0@tag.h2.0@text

ruleContent.content:
<js>
loadDocType="{{@@body@data-doctype}}";
loadType="{{@@body@data-randomtype}}";
sid=baseUrl.match(/(\d+).html/)[1];
url=baseUrl.replace(/\d+.html/,'')

var section = {
    loadDocType: loadDocType,
    loadType: loadType,
    sid:sid,
    content: {
        childNode: [],
        
        init: function(c){
            this.body=c
            if (section.loadType == 'normal') {
      this.load(String(java.base64Decode(java.getString('//*[@name="client"]/@content'))))
            } else if (section.loadType == 'substep') {
                var d = 'r' + section.sid;
                var f = false;
                if (section.loadDocType == 'xml') {
                    d += '.xml'
                } else if (section.loadDocType == 'json') {
                    d += '.json';
                    f = true
                } else {
                    return false
                };        
             cookie="PHPSESSID="+java.get(baseUrl,{}).cookie("PHPSESSID");
            token= java.get(url+d,{"X-Requested-With": "XMLHttpRequest","referer":baseUrl,"cookie":String(cookie)}).header("token")                
                	this.load(token)      	
            } else {
                return false
            };               
        },
        load: function(a) {         
            a = String(java.base64Decode(a)).split(/[A-Z]+%/);      
            var b = 0,
            start = 0;
            for (var i = 0; i < this.body.length; i++) {
                if (String(this.body[i]).match(/h2/i)) {
                    start = i + 1
                };
                if (String(this.body[i]).match(/div/i)&& this.body[i].attr("class") != 'chapter') {
                    break
                }
            };
          
            for (var i = 0; i < a.length; i++) {
                if (a[i] < 5) {
                    this.childNode[a[i]] = this.body[i + start];
                      b++
                } else {
                    this.childNode[a[i] - b] = this.body[i + start]                 
                }
            };
  }
}
}
section.content.init(java.getElement("@@id.content@children!0").toArray());
section.content.childNode.join("")
</js>
tag.div@ownText
